comment:
Баркодиалог между Теодорой и Абеляром после боя у глобуса.
Вопрос/реплика Теодоры (Т01, Т02, Т03)
Ответ/реплика Абеляра (А01, А02, А03).
Разбито все на 3 пары по номерам.

languages.text: "Когда подавим бунт, я хочу взглянуть на отчеты логистикаров — надо понять, что происходило на палубах во время перелета и подготовки к нему".

traits.locale_text: "Когда подавим бунт, я хочу взглянуть на отчеты логистикаров — надо понять, что происходило на палубах во время перелета и подготовки к нему".

languages.text: "Once we are done with the riot, I want to have a look at the logisticars' reports — we need to understand what happened on the decks during the warp jump and the preparations preceding it."
languages.original_text: "Когда подавим бунт, я хочу взглянуть на отчеты логистикаров — надо понять, что происходило на палубах во время перелета и подготовки к нему".

traits.locale_text: "Once we are done with the riot, I want to have a look at the logisticars' reports — we need to understand what happened on the decks during the warp travel and previous preparations."
"Once we are done with the riot, I want to have a look at the logisticars' reports — we need to understand what happened on the decks during the warp jump and the preparations preceding it."
"Once we are done with the riot, I want to have a look at the logisticars' reports — we need to understand what happened on the decks during the warp jump and the preparations preceding it."
"Once we are done with the riot, I want to have a look at the logisticars' reports — we need to understand what happened on the decks during the warp jump and the preparations preceding it."

languages.text: “等这场暴乱平息之后，我得看看后勤人员的报告。我们必须弄清楚，亚空间跃迁期间甲板上发生了什么事情，这些事情到底是怎么发生的。”
languages.original_text: "Once we are done with the riot, I want to have a look at the logisticars' reports — we need to understand what happened on the decks during the warp jump and the preparations preceding it."

traits.locale_text: “等这场暴乱平息之后，我得看看后勤人员的报告。我们必须弄清楚，亚空间跃迁期间甲板上发生了什么事情，这些事情到底是怎么发生的。”

languages.text: «En cuanto resolvamos esta revuelta, quiero echar un vistazo a los informes de los logisticars; tenemos que entender qué ha ocurrido en las cubiertas durante el salto de disformidad y todas sus preparaciones previas».
languages.original_text: "Once we are done with the riot, I want to have a look at the logisticars' reports — we need to understand what happened on the decks during the warp jump and the preparations preceding it."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto resolvamos esta revuelta, quiero echar un vistazo a los informes de los logisticars; tenemos que entender qué ha ocurrido en las cubiertas durante el salto a la disformidad y todas sus preparaciones previas».

languages.text: 「暴動が終わったら論理学者の報告を見てみたいと思います。ワープジャンプ中にデッキで何が起こったのか、そして、その前の準備に何をしたかを理解しなければなりません」
languages.original_text: "Once we are done with the riot, I want to have a look at the logisticars' reports — we need to understand what happened on the decks during the warp jump and the preparations preceding it."

traits.locale_text: 「暴動が終わったら論理学者の報告を見てみたいと思います。ワープジャンプ中にデッキで何が起こったのか、そして、その前の準備に何をしたかを理解しなければなりません」
「暴動が終わったら論理学者の報告を見てみたいと思います。ワープジャンプ中にデッキで何が起こったのか、そして、その前の準備に何をしたかを理解しなければなりません」

languages.text: « Je me pencherai sur les rapports des logisticars une fois que nous aurons maté cette émeute. Nous devons déterminer ce qu'il s'est passé sur les ponts pendant le saut Warp et les préparatifs qui l'ont précédé. »
languages.original_text: "Once we are done with the riot, I want to have a look at the logisticars' reports — we need to understand what happened on the decks during the warp jump and the preparations preceding it."

traits.locale_text: « Je me pencherai sur les rapports des logisticars une fois que nous aurons maté cette émeute. Nous devons déterminer ce qu'il s'est passé sur les ponts pendant le saut Warp et les préparatifs qui l'ont précédé. »

languages.text: "Sobald wir den Aufstand niedergeschlagen haben, will ich die Berichte der Logistikare sehen – wir müssen wissen, was während des Warpsprungs und der Vorbereitungen dafür vorgefallen ist."
languages.original_text: "Once we are done with the riot, I want to have a look at the logisticars' reports — we need to understand what happened on the decks during the warp jump and the preparations preceding it."

traits.locale_text: "Sobald wir den Aufstand niedergeschlagen haben, will ich die Berichte der Logistikare sehen – wir müssen wissen, was während des Warpsprungs und der Vorbereitungen dafür vorgefallen ist."

languages.text: "İsyanın icabına baktıktan sonra lojistikar raporlarına göz atmak istiyorum. Öte sıçrama ve öncesindeki hazırlıklar esnasında güvertelerde ne yaşandığını iyi anlamalıyız."
languages.original_text: "Once we are done with the riot, I want to have a look at the logisticars' reports — we need to understand what happened on the decks during the warp jump and the preparations preceding it."

traits.locale_text: "İsyanın icabına baktıktan sonra lojistikar raporlarına göz atmak istiyorum. Öte sıçrama ve öncesindeki hazırlıklar esnasında güvertelerde ne yaşandığını iyi anlamalıyız."
